thread.title: Video: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo interacts with fans through fence
thread.title_full: Video: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo interacts with fans through fence

title: Video: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo interacts with fans through fence
text:
Video: Cubs' Anthony Rizzo interacts with fans through fence Two huge Chicago Cubs fans didn't let a fence stop them from meeting first baseman Anthony Rizzo. 
A fence wasn't going to get in the way of these diehard Chicago Cubs fans chance to meet first baseman Anthony Rizzo. 
Rizzo made these two fans' days, when he stopped to talk to them. — Chicago Cubs (@Cubs) February 20, 2017 
Could always use the extra help. https://t.co/DsAFEpD1YT — Anthony Rizzo (@ARizzo44) February 20, 2017 
Who knows, maybe their prayers will bring the Cubs another World Series? Author
